title: opencode
author: Zac Zuo
excerpt: opencode is an open-source AI coding agent built for the terminal. It features a native TUI, multi-session support, and is model-agnostic, letting you use Claude, OpenAI, Google, or even local models.
text: opencode is an open-source AI coding agent built for the terminal. It features a native TUI, multi-session support, and is model-agnostic, letting you use Claude, OpenAI, Google, or even local models.
html: opencode is an open-source AI coding agent built for the terminal. It features a native TUI, multi-session support, and is model-agnostic, letting you use Claude, OpenAI, Google, or even local models.
